name: BAM
description:
You're an elite sniper in service of her majesty, the Queen of Block Kingdom.

Your mission is to eliminate the spies that infiltrated this peaceful unsuspecting town. They blend in to the crowd quite nicely, but we were able to track them down using our special Majesty Drones. 

Don't worry about removing them, they are in fact reptiles, so this is an infestation. Remove it!

Assets used:

- City: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/simple-town-cartoon-...

- Characters: https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-2
